alert.note: Alert for Flat Tops; Gore and Elk Mountains, Central Mountain Valleys (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 24 at 2:40AM MDT until April 26 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 6 AM MDT WEDNESDAY ABOVE 9000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 9000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 14 inches. * WHERE...Gore and Elk Mountains/Central Mountain Valleys and Flat Tops. * WHEN...From noon today to 6 AM MDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Flat Tops; Gore and Elk Mountains, Central Mountain Valleys
